title: powers conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare Act 2021 (Section 20)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare Act 2021 (Section 20) 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited social welfare act 2021 (section 20) (commencement) order 2022

title: powers conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44
heading: 2. The 1st day of June 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 20 of
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of June 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 20 of 

the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44 of 2021) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 May, 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th June, 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [284] 3

title: powers conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the commencement of Section 20 of the Social Welfare 
Act 2021 from 1 June 2022. 

Section 20 provides for the expansion of the list of agri-environmental schemes 
attracting the specific means disregard applicable to Jobseeker’s Allowance, 
Farm Assist and State Pension (Non-Contributory).
